article_title: Jennifer Lawrence and Jimmy Fallon tried to dance with J-Lo and it was awkward
article_text:
Topics: dancing, jello shots, Jennifer Lawrence, Jennifer Lopez, Jimmy Fallon, jlo, Music, tonight show, Video, Entertainment News

“You made me look like a freak in front of J-Lo, do you know what that feels like?!” screamed Jennifer Lawrence to Jimmy Fallon, once again demonstrating why we need more Jennifer Lawrence. On “The Tonight Show” Thursday night, she and Fallon told the perfect story — it included Kanye West’s music, jello shots, J-Lo, awkward dance moves and more awkwardness.

Someone please give Lawrence her own talk show … now.
